member.name: M:ApiGateway.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Configures HTTP request pipeline.
member.remarks: The order that middleware components are added in the Configure method defines the order in which they are invoked on requests, and the reverse order for the response. This ordering is critical for security, performance, and functionality.
member.param: An instance of object providing mechanism to configure application request
An instance of object providing information about web hosting environment
An instance of object used to configure the logging system and create instances of from registered logging providers
